description: A history of web development, an introduction to industry-leading front-end technologies and challenging what you think is possible in the browser with some fun experiments in Javascript.
A React + Gatsby + Socket.io solution for crystal clear slides for everyone using minimal bandwidth + slide navigation using gestures.
A React + Gatsby + Socket.io solution for crystal clear slides for everyone using minimal bandwidth + slide navigation using gestures.
Tips & tricks to make your hack stand out from the crowd.
